items.title: ChatGPT adds more PC and Mac app integrations, getting closer to piloting your computer
items.description: ChatGPT can now support more coding platforms and applications on its desktop apps, opening the door for more agentic use in the future.

items.title: Google unveils new reasoning model Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking to rival OpenAI o1
items.description: Unlike competitor reasoning model o1 from OpenAI, Gemini 2.0 enables users to access its step-by-step reasoning through a dropdown menu.

items.title: Stable Diffusion 3.5 hits Amazon Bedrock: What it means for enterprise AI workflows
items.description: Stability AI CEO drives enterprise AI focus home as the flagship Stable Diffusion models land on Amazon Bedrock.

items.title: Small model, big impact: Patronus AI’s Glider outperforms GPT-4 in key AI evaluation tasks
items.description: Patronus AI launches Glider, a breakthrough 3.8B-parameter language model that rivals GPT-4's evaluation capabilities while running on-device, offerin...

items.title: Beyond LLMs: How SandboxAQ’s large quantitative models could optimize enterprise AI
items.description: Alphabet spinout SandboxAQ is advancing large quantitative models to help enterprise AI optimize value creation.
